name: Dribbble
desc: I used to be active here, but not in years. Maybe again some day!

name: Flickr
desc: I keep forgetting to share new photos here, but somehow I still love this old site.

name: GitHub
desc: Most of my public stuff here is either for kicks or stuff I might do at some point, maybe.

name: LinkedIn
desc: Inspiration for the best-ever New Yorker cartoon caption.

name: Mastodon
desc: I'm somewhat active over here; maybe it will be the successor to Twitter.

name: Pinboard
desc: I bookmark a lot of stuff that I find interesting and want to find later. Pinboard also pulls down URLs in tweets (and maybe someday toots) I like.

name: The StoryGraph
desc: I like books and feel like tracking what I read could motivate me to read more.

name: Tumblr
desc: I lost access to my very old account, but it only had one post on it. This one is mostly just cross-posts from Instagram, at least for now.

name: Twitter
desc: I owe a lot of my career to Twitter, and its current direction saddens me.
